sprykerComponent.name: ajax-provider
sprykerComponent.readme:
Enables ajax requests to be performed to a specified url with URL parameters and response handling.

Code sample

{% include molecule('ajax-provider') with {
    attributes: {
       'fetch-on-load': false,
       'url': 'url',
       'method': 'method',
       'response-type': 'response-type'
    }
} only %}

tags.name: event
tags.description: fetching An event which is triggered when an ajax request is sent to the server.

tags.name: event
tags.description: fetched An event which is triggered when an ajax request is closed.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Sends an ajax request to the server.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Optional data sent to the server in the request body.

tags.name: template
tags.description: The argument type returned by a successful promise.

tags.name: returns
tags.description: A generic typed promise connected to the ajax request.
